TopicTitle: Alignment of Quasars and Large Scale Structures

Articles.Content:
I ran across this article a little while back (Nov 19th), which I found very interesting. Just thought I'd share it and see what the interest here might be about it.

Spooky Alignment of Quasars Across Billions of Light-years

VLT reveals alignments between supermassive black hole axes and large-scale structure

As Spock would say - "fascinating".
